news.content: Started a Research Internship at Huawei Hong Kong Research Center (HKRC), Fermat Lab (Huawei 2012 Labs), focusing on LLM-related mathematical reasoning data generation.
I will attend ACM MM 2024 in Melbourne, Australia. Welcome to have a chat with me at the conference!
One paper has been accepted by ACM MM 2024!
One paper has been accepted by ACL 2024!
One paper has been accepted by EMNLP 2023!
One paper has been accepted by ACL 2023 Findings!
One paper has been accepted by AAAI 2023!
